description: AbiWord is a word processor for Windows, macOS, and Linux. However, beginning with the release of version 3, the AbiSource community only develops the Linux version.

While AbiWord comes with various word-processing features, plug-ins allow you to customize the program by adding functionality not delivered with the original package. For example, you can install an AbiWord plug-in to open .SVG graphics or export a document to the .PDF format.
